emenma ema athi wishesha gasat pathraye nipunatha sanwardhana ha wruththiya puhunu amathyanshayata adala karyayan ha karthawyan yatathe ihalinma "pasal adhyapanaya harayamen pasu wishwa widyala adhyapanaya sadaha sudusukam nolabana sisunta wruththiya adhyapana awastha pulul kirimata hakiwana paridi prathipaththi sakasima ha pahasukam sapayima " lesa sandahan kara thibimen ema patamala hadarana sisun usas adhyapanaya hadarimata nusudusu sisun pirisak lesa hanwadu gasa athi bawa shishyayange tharkayayi.

eya pahatha sadhaka kihipaya osse wimasimata lak kere.  aakruthiyama rasaya nishpadanaye mulakangaya wima  arthaya anuwa aakruthiya nirmanaya kirima  nishchitha, niyamitha aakruthiyak nomathi wima  ekama pa්rasthuthayak wiwidhakruthi osse nirmanaya kirima  akuru kabali, thani akuru, wachana aadiyata aakruthiya sima wima  rasa nishpaththiya sandaha nawa aakruthi soya yama aakruthiyama rasaya nishpadanaye mulikangaya wima yamkisi kawiyaka samastha dharanawa aakruthiyak osse patakayata sapayima sulupatu karyayak nowe.
kawada ho ohuge nirmanaya barata barak samajayen ekathu wenawa.
